DIA_Kazeem_Q104_WorkForAlbyn_Description: The Elder needs hands for work.
DIA_Kazeem_Q104_WorkForAlbyn_15_00: The Elder needs hands to work. In return, he promised to keep us safe.
DIA_Kazeem_Q104_WorkForAlbyn_12_01: Helping out in the countryside can only mean one thing - the grind in the fields or kneading compost.
DIA_Kazeem_Q104_WorkForAlbyn_12_02: Well... you have to start somewhere, and if it makes us feel safe, so much the better.
DIA_Kazeem_Q104_WorkForAlbyn_12_03: He can count on my help.
DIA_Kazeem_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_15_01: Do you know anything about Jorn's disappearance?
DIA_Kazeem_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_12_02: Jorn is the bald guy from the ship?
DIA_Kazeem_GQ001_WhereIsJorn_12_03: I don't know anything about that. All this time I've been sitting here warming my frozen bones.
DIA_Kazeem_Ambient_03_01: Don't wander off the cave. We don't know the terrain, it might be too unsafe outside.
DIA_Kazeem_Ambient_03_02: Warm up, kid. We could all use a break.
DIA_Kazeem_Ambient_03_04: I'm glad your plan worked out. Thanks to you, I don't have to worry about money at least.
